titles: The praise of solitarinesse set down in the forme of a dialogue, wherein is conteyned, a discourse philosophical, of the lyfe actiue, and contemplatiue.
author: Baynes Roger, 1546-1623.
publisher: By Francis Coldocke and Henry Bynneman,
notes: Running title reads: The prayse of solitarinesse.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
